thread.title: SLIDE: Numbers Brain Training is now available on Google Play
thread.title_full: SLIDE: Numbers Brain Training is now available on Google Play

author: prbuzz.com
title: SLIDE: Numbers Brain Training is now available on Google Play
text:
Fractal Games Ltd. announces the release of Slide - a free and original multiplayer puzzle game. As the pilot project of the Fractal Gamesâ€™ platform, it boasts unique gameplay and develops your mind swiftness, logical and analytical skills. Slide is the perfect way to tease your brain, while having fun playing with friends. Slide is now available on Google Play but coming very soon on the Apple App Store as well.
Slide is the perfect training for your brain, encouraging mind swiftness, logic and analytical skills. Slide - Tease your brain to the fullest extent!
Each board has numbers and operations - multiplication, addition and subtraction. Drag the numbers to achieve a specified target.
Being suitable for all ages, the game is also quite challenging and fun.
There is only one way to find out! Create your own strategy and compete with other players online.
Features:
- Online Multiplayer Mode
- Solutions for Each Game
- Rankings
- Check Your Progress and Rank
- Detailed Statistics
- Unique Gameplay
PRO-mode:
- No ads
- Enables Offline Mode
- Adds 15 Seconds to Online Mode
- Save Your Boards and Share Them With Friends
About the company:
Fractal Games is a platform for original and highly addictive puzzle games which enhance hand-eye coordination, logical, analytical and cognitive thinking. Martin Antonov is the founder and game designer of the project. He is a young enthusiast, aged 25, graduated Mathematics at the University of Warwick in 2012. Addicted to games, puzzles and programming, he is also an entrepreneur and business advisor with multiple startup projects and one successfully sold business, which he started when he was 17.
